title: How to Change Your Display Name on RuneScape

steps.title: Select your new name.
steps.content: Select your new name. Make sure you’re familiar with RuneScape’s rules on inappropriate language, because they will not tolerate usernames that could be considered racist, offensive, or obscene. Consider having a backup name in place in case the one you want isn’t available.

steps.title: Go to the RuneScape website.
steps.content: Go to the RuneScape website. At the bottom left corner, click Profile and Settings. Login when you are prompted.

steps.title: Click the Change Character Name tab.
steps.content: Click the Change Character Name tab. Note that if you’re a new member, your account has to have been active for 28 days before you can change your name. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Type your desired name into the box.
steps.content: Type your desired name into the box. Then, click Set Name. If no error message comes up, you have successfully changed your name! This new name will appear everywhere in the game, including forums, friends lists, and clan lists. Note that your login information will not change. To revert back to your old name, go back into the name change function and type in your previous name, just as you would if you were changing it to a new name.

steps.title: Try a different name if yours wasn’t available.
steps.content: Try a different name if yours wasn’t available. Names might be unavailable because they’re already taken, or because they have been blocked by a filter for being inappropriate. To select one of the variations that was suggested, copy and paste it into the box, and click Set Name. To try a different name, simply type the new name into the box again and click Set Name to see if it’s available. Once a name has been relinquished by a user, it will become available again after 35 days, so if you’re holding out for a specific name, be patient and keep trying. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Login to the game.
steps.content: Login to the game. Some people receive error messages when trying to change their name on the RuneScape website. Try changing it in the game if that is the case.

steps.title: Select the Options Menu.
steps.content: Select the Options Menu. Go to settings, and select the helmet icon to open the hero interface. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Change your name.
steps.content: Change your name. Start by selecting the Change Name feature, and type in your new name. While you can only change your name every 28 days, there is an option that allows you to redeem a bond within the game to change your name before that waiting period is up.

steps.title: Select Check Availability.
steps.content: Select Check Availability. Your name change will take effect if the name is available, but if it’s not, try a different name or select one of the variations the game suggests.
